vulnerabilities: Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code
description: The function 'dust.loadSource' uses the 'eval' function to evaluate a string as code. This can lead to code injection vulnerabilities if the source string is not properly sanitized. This is related to CWE-95: Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code ('Eval Injection') and CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection').
